constituent: sigh, mouth, scarecrow, flowers, mouth, husband
koohiiStory1: A sigh escapes the mouth of the scarecrow, who laments: "...if I only had a brain, I could learn kanji".
koohiiStory2: I will let out a huge sigh of relief from my mouth when I learn the last kanji.
readingExamples: 嘆かわしい (なげ.かわしい), 嘆く (なげ.く)
words: 嘆く(なげく): to sigh, to lament, to grieve
